Html:
Last few days in my WPF app when load Openstreetmap it doesnt show anything i get:
Exception: The remote server returned an error (403) Forbidden. It worked perfectly for last few months and i noticed this problem two days ago.

Hi,

since today I've got the same Problem.

What is the problem ?

Hi,

I found the solution.
In MapProviders.GMapProvider.UserAgent must be insert any string thats identify your software or whatever.
Default is presumably forbidden.
When you change this the problem is gone.

Greetz
UserAgent fixed, it works fine now

Hi
What's the fix for this? New dlls or change the call in the application?

Just add this line in your application (in your main window constructor or OnLoad for instance) :
MapProviders.GMapProvider.UserAgent = "put any string right there or the name of your application";

Hi,

We also had this problem in our application and have applied the fix (successfully). Does anyone know what caused it, I was worried that we had been blocked for some reason, but after reading this it seems like a more general issue.

I had the same problem. Very happy I found this post.

At what point does openstreetmaps block a user?
